example.en: a dance class/routine
example.cn: 舞蹈课；一套舞蹈动作

example.en: Find a partner and practise these new dance steps .
example.cn: 找个舞伴来练习这些新舞步。

example.en: Do you know any other Latin American dances?
example.cn: 你会跳其他拉美舞蹈吗？

example.en: The next dance will be a waltz.
example.cn: 接下来是华尔兹舞。

example.en: an evening of drama, music and dance
example.cn: 戏剧、音乐和舞蹈晚会

example.en: modern/classical dance
example.cn: 现代╱古典舞蹈

example.en: a dance company/troupe
example.cn: 舞蹈团；舞蹈队

example.en: Let's have a dance.
example.cn: 咱们跳个舞吧。

example.en: He did a little dance of triumph.
example.cn: 他兴高采烈地跳了几步舞。

example.en: We hold a dance every year to raise money for charity.
example.cn: 我们每年举行一场舞会，为慈善事业募捐。

example.en: The band finished with a few slow dances.
example.cn: 乐队最后演奏了几首节奏缓慢的舞曲。

example.en: Do you want to dance?
example.cn: 你想跳舞吗？

example.en: He asked me to dance.
example.cn: 他邀请我跳舞。

example.en: They stayed up all night singing and dancing.
example.cn: 他们唱啊，跳啊，一宿没睡。

example.en: They danced to the music of a string quartet.
example.cn: 他们随着弦乐四重奏乐曲跳舞。

example.en: Ruth danced all evening with Richard.
example.cn: 整个晚上鲁思都和理查德跳舞。

example.en: Ruth and Richard danced together all evening.
example.cn: 鲁思和理查德整晚都在一起跳舞。

example.en: to dance the tango
example.cn: 跳探戈舞

example.en: to dance a waltz
example.cn: 跳华尔兹舞

example.en: The children danced around her.
example.cn: 孩子们在她周围蹦蹦跳跳。

example.en: The sun shone on the sea and the waves danced and sparkled.
example.cn: 太阳照在海面上，碧浪翻滚，波光粼粼。

example.en: The words danced before her tired eyes.
example.cn: 这些字在她疲乏的眼前晃动。

explain: n. - 舞蹈；跳舞；舞会；舞曲
v. - 跳舞；雀跃；跳…舞；跳跃
网络 - 舞蹈学；手舞足蹈；摇晃

example.en: I like your dress.
example.cn: 我喜欢你的连衣裙。

example.en: Excuse me, is this your seat?
example.cn: 对不起，这是您的座位吗？

example.en: The bank is on your right.
example.cn: 银行在你的右边。

example.en: Dentists advise you to have your teeth checked every six months.
example.cn: 牙医建议大家每六个月检查一次牙齿。

example.en: In Japan you are taught great respect for your elders.
example.cn: 在日本，人们要学会非常尊敬长辈。

example.en: This is your typical English pub.
example.cn: 这就是典型的英格兰酒吧。

example.en: You and your bright ideas!
example.cn: 你的主意可真高明！

example.en: Your Majesty
example.cn: 陛下

example.en: Your Excellency
example.cn: 阁下

explain: adv. - 你的；您的；你们的；（泛指）大家的
pron. - 你(们)的；大家都很知道的
网络 - 称别人的事物；物主代词

example.en: Ben's a wonderful father.
example.cn: 本是个极好的父亲。

example.en: You've been like a father to me.
example.cn: 你对我一直像父亲一样。

example.en: Our new boss is a father of three(= he has three children) .
example.cn: 我们的新老板是三个孩子的父亲。

example.en: He was a wonderful father to both his natural and adopted children.
example.cn: 他对亲生的和领养的子女都很好。

example.en: Father, I cannot lie to you.
example.cn: 爸爸，我不能对你说谎。

example.en: the land of our fathers
example.cn: 我们祖先的土地

example.en: Henry Moore is considered to be the father of modern British sculpture.
example.cn: 亨利 ) 穆尔被认为是现代英国雕塑之父。

example.en: Father, forgive us.
example.cn: 天父，宽恕我们吧。

example.en: God the Father
example.cn: 天父

example.en: Father Dominic
example.cn: 多米尼克神父

example.en: He claims to have fathered over 20 children.
example.cn: 他声称有 20 多个亲生子女。

explain: n. - 父亲；爸爸；天父；上帝
v. - 成为父亲；做父亲；创立（新思想）；创造
网络 - 神父；神甫；祖先

example.en: She's still learning to read.
example.cn: 她还在学习识字。

example.en: Some children can read and write before they go to school.
example.cn: 有些孩子在上学前就会看书写字了。

example.en: I can't read your writing.
example.cn: 我看不懂你的笔迹。

example.en: Can you read music?
example.cn: 你识谱吗？

example.en: I'm trying to read the map.
example.cn: 我正看地图呢。

example.en: I'm going to go to bed and read.
example.cn: 我要上床看书去。

example.en: He liked reading to his grandchildren.
example.cn: 他喜欢念书给孙子孙女听。

example.en: to read a book/a magazine/the newspaper
example.cn: 读书；看杂志；看报纸

example.en: Have you read any Steinbeck(= novels by him) ?
example.cn: 你读过斯坦贝克的小说吗？

example.en: He read the poem aloud.
example.cn: 他朗读了这首诗。

example.en: Go on─read it to us.
example.cn: 念吧，念给我们听听。

example.en: She read us a story.
example.cn: 她给我们读了个故事。

example.en: I read about the accident in the local paper.
example.cn: 我在当地的报纸上看到了这次事故。

example.en: I read that he had resigned.
example.cn: 我看到了他辞职的消息。

example.en: Don't believe everything you read in the papers.
example.cn: 报上看到的东西，不能尽信。

example.en: How do you read the present situation?
example.cn: 你对目前的形势有何看法？

example.en: Silence must not always be read as consent.
example.cn: 不能总是将沉默理解为同意。

example.en: The sign read ‘No admittance’.
example.cn: 告示牌上写着“禁止入内”。

example.en: I've changed the last paragraph. It now reads as follows…
example.cn: 我已经修改了最后一段。现在是这样写的…

example.en: Generally, the article reads very well.
example.cn: 总的来说，这篇文章读起来很不错。

example.en: The poem reads like(= sounds as if it is) a translation.
example.cn: 这首诗读起来像是译文。

example.en: What does the thermometer read?
example.cn: 温度计的读数是多少？

example.en: A man came to read the gas meter.
example.cn: 一个男子来查了煤气表。

example.en: ‘Do you read me?’ ‘I'm reading you loud and clear.’
example.cn: “你听得见我的话吗？”“听见了，你的声音又大又清楚。”

example.en: For ‘madam’ in line 3 read ‘madman’.
example.cn: 第 3 行中的 madam 应为 madman。

example.en: I read English at Oxford.
example.cn: 我在牛津攻读英语。

example.en: She's reading for a law degree.
example.cn: 她在攻读法学学位。

example.en: My computer can't read the CD-ROM you sent.
example.cn: 我的电脑不能读你送来的光盘。

example.en: to read a file into a computer
example.cn: 把文件读入电脑

example.en: Reading between the lines, I think Clare needs money.
example.cn: 斟酌一下她的言外之意，我觉得克莱尔需要钱。

example.en: Reading between the lines, I think Clare needs money.
example.cn: 斟酌一下她的言外之意，我觉得克莱尔需要钱。

example.en: Read my lips: no new taxes(= I promise there will be no new taxes) .
example.cn: 注意听我说：不会征新税。

example.en: Read my lips: no new taxes(= I promise there will be no new taxes) .
example.cn: 注意听我说：不会征新税。

example.en: Can we take it as read that you want the job?
example.cn: 我们能不能认为你想要这份工作？

example.en: Can we take it as read that you want the job?
example.cn: 我们能不能认为你想要这份工作？

example.en: I was having a quiet read when the phone rang.
example.cn: 我在静静地看书，忽然电话铃响了。

example.en: His thrillers are always a gripping read.
example.cn: 他的惊险小说向来引人入胜。

example.en: She's very widely read in law.
example.cn: 她在法律方面知识渊博。

explain: v. - 读；阅读；朗读；读懂
n. - 阅读；读书；好的（或有意思等的）读物；好书（或文章等）
adj. - 博学的；熟知的；精通的
网络 - 读取；可读；看

example.en: We're brothers.
example.cn: 我们是亲兄弟。

example.en: He's my brother.
example.cn: 他是我哥哥（或弟弟）。

example.en: an older/younger brother
example.cn: 哥哥；弟弟

example.en: a twin brother
example.cn: 孪生哥哥（或弟弟）

example.en: Does she have any brothers and sisters ?
example.cn: 她有兄弟姐妹吗？

example.en: Edward was the youngest of the Kennedy brothers.
example.cn: 爱德华是肯尼迪弟兄中最小的一个。

example.en: He was like a brother to me(= very close) .
example.cn: 他如同我的亲兄弟一样。

example.en: We must work together, brothers!
example.cn: 我们必须携手工作，伙计们！

example.en: He was greatly respected by his brother officers.
example.cn: 他非常受军官同僚的敬重。

example.en: We must support our weaker brethren.
example.cn: 我们必须支持弱势的同胞。

example.en: Brother Luke
example.cn: 卢克修士

example.en: The Brethren meet regularly for prayer.
example.cn: 兄弟教会成员定期聚集祈祷。

example.en: Oh brother!
example.cn: 天哪！

explain: n. - （同父母的）兄；（称男性的共事者或同道）同事
int. - 表示生气或吃惊
v. - 和…结成弟兄
网络 - 兄弟；兄弟牌；哥哥

example.en: I want to buy a present for my mother and father.
example.cn: 我想给爸爸妈妈买件礼物。

example.en: the relationship between mother and baby
example.cn: 母婴关系

example.en: She's the mother of twins.
example.cn: 她有一对双胞胎。

example.en: a mother of three(= with three children)
example.cn: 三个孩子的妈妈

example.en: an expectant(= pregnant) mother
example.cn: 孕妇

example.en: She was a wonderful mother to both her natural and adopted children.
example.cn: 她对亲生的和领养的孩子一样好。

example.en: the mother chimpanzee caring for her young
example.cn: 照料着幼崽的母猩猩

example.en: I learnt these songs at my mother's knee.
example.cn: 我小时候学过这些歌曲。

example.en: I learnt these songs at my mother's knee.
example.cn: 我小时候学过这些歌曲。

example.en: I got stuck in the mother of all traffic jams.
example.cn: 我被困在一次超级严重的大塞车之中。

example.en: I got stuck in the mother of all traffic jams.
example.cn: 我被困在一次超级严重的大塞车之中。

example.en: He was a disturbed child who needed mothering.
example.cn: 他是个心理失常的孩子，需要悉心照顾。

example.en: Stop mothering me!
example.cn: 我不要你的照顾！

explain: n. - 母亲；嬷嬷；对年过中年的女性表示尊敬的称呼
v. - 像母亲一样照顾
网络 - 妈妈；两个妈妈；地球冒险

example.en: She's my sister.
example.cn: 她是我姐姐。

example.en: an older/younger sister
example.cn: 姐姐；妹妹

example.en: a big/little/kid sister
example.cn: 大姐；小妹；年幼的妹妹

example.en: We're sisters.
example.cn: 我们是姐妹。

example.en: Do you have any brothers or sisters ?
example.cn: 你有兄弟姐妹吗？

example.en: My best friend has been like a sister to me(= very close) .
example.cn: 我最要好的一个朋友和我亲如姐妹。

example.en: They supported their sisters in the dispute.
example.cn: 在争论中，她们支持自己的姐妹。

example.en: Sister Mary
example.cn: 修女玛丽

example.en: the Sisters of Charity
example.cn: 仁爱修女会

example.en: our sister company in Italy
example.cn: 我们在意大利的姊妹公司

example.en: a sister ship
example.cn: 同一类型的船

explain: n. - 姐；妹；护士长；（称志同道合者）姐妹
adj. - 姐妹的；同类(型)的
v. - 如姐妹般相待
网络 - 姐姐；妹妹；姊妹

example.en: James has sold his car.
example.cn: 詹姆斯把他的车卖了。

example.en: He broke his leg skiing.
example.cn: 他滑雪时摔断了腿。

example.en: He took my hand in his.
example.cn: 他握住我的手。

example.en: The choice was his.
example.cn: 选择由他作出。

example.en: a friend of his
example.cn: 他的一位朋友

explain: det. - 他的；用于名词前；自己的；各自的
adv. - 他的；上帝的；属于上帝的
pron. - 他的
网络 - 医院信息系统(Hospital Information System)；医院信息管理系统；组氨酸(histidine)

example.en: Where's my passport?
example.cn: 我的护照在哪儿？

example.en: My feet are cold.
example.cn: 我的脚冷。

example.en: My goodness! Look at the time!
example.cn: 天哪！看看几点了！

example.en: my dear/darling/love
example.cn: 亲爱的；我的宝贝儿╱心肝儿

example.en: My dear girl, you're wrong.
example.cn: 我亲爱的姑娘，你错了。

explain: int. - 哎呀；表示惊讶
adv. - 我的；表示吃惊等；表示亲切；对下级的称呼
abbr. - (=Malaysia)马来西亚
pron. - "I" 的所有格形式
网络 - 马来西亚(Malaysia)；关於我；买

example.en: You draw beautifully.
example.cn: 你的画画得真好。

example.en: to draw a picture/diagram/graph
example.cn: 画画╱示意图╱曲线图

example.en: She drew a house.
example.cn: 她画了一栋房屋。

example.en: He drew a circle in the sand with a stick.
example.cn: 他用枝条在沙地上画了一个圆。

example.en: The report drew a grim picture of inefficiency and corruption.
example.cn: 这份报告描绘了一幅办事效率低下和贪污腐化的可怕景象。

example.en: He drew the cork out of the bottle.
example.cn: 他把瓶塞拔了出来。

example.en: I drew my chair up closer to the fire.
example.cn: 我把椅子向火旁拉近了点。

example.en: She drew me onto the balcony.
example.cn: 她把我拉到阳台上。

example.en: I tried to draw him aside(= for example where I could talk to him privately) .
example.cn: 我试图把他拉到一边。

example.en: My eyes were drawn to the man in the corner.
example.cn: 角落里的那个男人引起了我的注意。

example.en: The Queen's coach was drawn by six horses.
example.cn: 女王的御驾是由六匹马拉的。

example.en: a horse-drawn carriage
example.cn: 马车

example.en: The blinds were drawn.
example.cn: 窗帘拉上了。

example.en: It was getting dark so I switched on the light and drew the curtains.
example.cn: 天快黑了，我便打开灯，拉上了窗帘。

example.en: She drew back the curtains and let the sunlight in.
example.cn: 她拉开窗帘让阳光照进来。

example.en: The train drew into the station.
example.cn: 火车徐徐驶入车站。

example.en: The train drew in.
example.cn: 火车进站了。

example.en: The figures in the distance seemed to be drawing closer.
example.cn: 远处的人影好像越来越近。

example.en: Their car drew alongside ours.
example.cn: 他们的汽车与我们的并排行驶。

example.en: Her retirement is drawing near.
example.cn: 她快退休了。

example.en: The meeting was drawing to a close .
example.cn: 会议快结束了。

example.en: She drew a revolver on me.
example.cn: 她拔出左轮手枪对准我。

example.en: He came towards them with his sword drawn.
example.cn: 他手持出鞘的剑向他们走来。

example.en: The movie is drawing large audiences.
example.cn: 这部影片吸引着大批观众。

example.en: The course draws students from all over the country.
example.cn: 这课程吸引着来自全国各地的学生。

example.en: Her screams drew passers-by to the scene.
example.cn: 她的惊叫声把过路人吸引到了现场。

example.en: The plan has drawn a lot of criticism.
example.cn: 这个计划引来众多批评。

example.en: The announcement drew loud applause from the audience.
example.cn: 公告博得观众的热烈掌声。

example.en: Spielberg refused to be drawn on his next movie.
example.cn: 斯皮尔伯格拒绝透露他下一部影片的任何消息。

example.en: What conclusions did you draw from the report?
example.cn: 你从这个报告中得出了什么结论？

example.en: We can draw some lessons for the future from this accident.
example.cn: 我们可以从这起事故中为今后吸取教训。

example.en: to draw an analogy/a comparison/a parallel/a distinction between two events
example.cn: 对两件事进行类比╱比较；找出两件事之间的相似之处╱区别

example.en: We drew for partners.
example.cn: 我们抓阄决定伙伴。

example.en: They had to draw lots to decide who would go.
example.cn: 他们只得抽签决定谁去。

example.en: He drew the winning ticket.
example.cn: 他抽到中彩券了。

example.en: Names were drawn from a hat for the last few places.
example.cn: 从帽子里抽签来决定最后几个名额。

example.en: Italy has been drawn against Spain in the first round.
example.cn: 第一轮比赛的抽签结果是意大利队对西班牙队。

example.en: Italy has been drawn to play Spain.
example.cn: 抽签结果是意大利队对西班牙队。

example.en: England and France drew.
example.cn: 英格兰队和法国队打平。

example.en: England and France drew 3–3.
example.cn: 英格兰队与法国队打成三平。

example.en: England drew with/against France.
example.cn: 英格兰队与法国队打成平局。

example.en: England drew their game against France.
example.cn: 英格兰队与法国队战平了。

example.en: I drew out £200.
example.cn: 我取了 200 英镑。

example.en: Can I draw $80 out of my account?
example.cn: 我可以从我的账户上提取 80 元钱吗？

example.en: She went to the post office to draw her pension.
example.cn: 她到邮局去领取她的养老金。

example.en: The cheque was drawn on his personal account.
example.cn: 这张支票从他的个人账户中支付。

example.en: to draw water from a well
example.cn: 从井中抽水

example.en: The device draws gas along the pipe.
example.cn: 这装置将气体顺着管子抽出来。

example.en: He drew thoughtfully on his pipe.
example.cn: 他若有所思地抽着烟斗。

example.en: She breathed deeply, drawing in the fresh mountain air.
example.cn: 她深深地呼吸着山上的新鲜空气。

example.en: So far, the police investigation has drawn a blank.
example.cn: 到目前为止警方的调查毫无结果。

example.en: So far, the police investigation has drawn a blank.
example.cn: 到目前为止警方的调查毫无结果。

example.en: She talks all the time and hardly stops to draw breath.
example.cn: 她一直滔滔不绝，几乎没停下来喘口气。

example.en: He was as kind a man as ever drew breath.
example.cn: 他是世上少有的大善人。

example.en: She talks all the time and hardly stops to draw breath.
example.cn: 她一直滔滔不绝，几乎没停下来喘口气。

example.en: He was as kind a man as ever drew breath.
example.cn: 他是世上少有的大善人。

example.en: I don't mind helping, but I draw the line at doing everything myself.
example.cn: 我帮忙倒无所谓，但可不能什么事都让我做。

example.en: We would have liked to invite all our relatives, but you have to draw the line somewhere.
example.cn: 我们本倒是愿意邀请所有亲戚的，但你总得有个限度呀。

example.en: I don't mind helping, but I draw the line at doing everything myself.
example.cn: 我帮忙倒无所谓，但可不能什么事都让我做。

example.en: We would have liked to invite all our relatives, but you have to draw the line somewhere.
example.cn: 我们本倒是愿意邀请所有亲戚的，但你总得有个限度呀。

example.en: Where do you draw the line between genius and madness?
example.cn: 天才和疯狂之间如何划界呢？

example.en: Where do you draw the line between genius and madness?
example.cn: 天才和疯狂之间如何划界呢？

example.en: I drew the short straw and had to clean the toilets.
example.cn: 我抽到了下下签，只得打扫厕所了。

example.en: I drew the short straw and had to clean the toilets.
example.cn: 我抽到了下下签，只得打扫厕所了。

example.en: We drew straws for who went first.
example.cn: 我们抽签决定谁先去。

example.en: We drew straws for who went first.
example.cn: 我们抽签决定谁先去。

example.en: the draw for the second round of the Champions League
example.cn: 欧洲冠军联赛第二轮抽签

example.en: The draw for the raffle takes place on Saturday.
example.cn: 星期六进行抽彩。

example.en: The match ended in a two-all draw.
example.cn: 比赛以二平结束。

example.en: He managed to hold Smith to a draw(= to stop him from winning when he seemed likely to do so) .
example.cn: 他总算与史密斯打了个平局。

example.en: a prize draw
example.cn: 抽奖

example.en: Liverpool have an away draw against Manchester United.
example.cn: 利物浦队抽的签是在客场与曼彻斯特联队进行比赛。

example.en: There are only two seeded players left in the top half of the draw.
example.cn: 在抽签系列比赛的上半区就只剩下两名种子选手了。

example.en: She is currently one of the biggest draws on the Irish music scene.
example.cn: 她是目前爱尔兰音乐界最受欢迎的人物之一。

example.en: You can't fool him─ he's always quick on the draw.
example.cn: 你骗不了他，他脑筋一向很快。

example.en: You can't fool him─ he's always quick on the draw.
example.cn: 你骗不了他，他脑筋一向很快。

explain: n. - 抽彩；抽奖；抽签；平局
v. - 描画；拖（动）；拉（动）；牵引
网络 - 绘制；绘图；画画

example.en: In some countries children don't start learning to read and write until they are six.
example.cn: 有些国家的儿童到了六岁才开始学习读书写字。

example.en: Please write in pen on both sides of the paper.
example.cn: 请用钢笔在纸的正反两面书写。

example.en: I haven't got anything to write with.
example.cn: 我没有笔可以写字。

example.en: Write your name at the top of the paper.
example.cn: 请把名字写在纸的顶端。

example.en: The teacher wrote the answers on the board.
example.cn: 老师把答案写在黑板上。

example.en: The ‘b’ had been wrongly written as a ‘d’.
example.cn: b 错写成 d 了。

example.en: to write a novel/a song/an essay/a computer program, etc.
example.cn: 写小说、写歌、写散文、编计算机程序等

example.en: Who was ‘The Grapes of Wrath’ written by?
example.cn: 《愤怒的葡萄》是谁写的？

example.en: Which opera did Verdi write first?
example.cn: 威尔第最早写的是哪一部歌剧？

example.en: He hopes to write a book about his experiences one day.
example.cn: 他希望有一天写一部关于自己经历的书。

example.en: She had to write a report on the project.
example.cn: 她必须就这个项目写一份报告。

example.en: I wanted to travel and then write about it.
example.cn: 我本想去旅行，然后把见闻写下来。

example.en: He writes for the ‘New Yorker’(= works as a writer) .
example.cn: 他为《纽约客》撰稿。

example.en: No decision has been made at the time of writing .
example.cn: 写这个的时候尚未作出决定。

example.en: She wrote him several poems.
example.cn: 她为他写了几首诗。

example.en: Bye! Don't forget to write.
example.cn: 再见！别忘了写信。

example.en: Can you write and confirm your booking?
example.cn: 你能写信来确认你的预订项目吗？

example.en: I'm writing to enquire about language courses.
example.cn: 特此致函询问有关语言课程事宜。

example.en: She wrote to him in France.
example.cn: 她给他往法国写信。

example.en: I wrote a letter to the Publicity Department.
example.cn: 我给宣传部写了一封信。

example.en: I wrote the Publicity Department a letter.
example.cn: 我给宣传部写了一封信。

example.en: She wrote that they were all fine.
example.cn: 她信上说他们一切安好。

example.en: Write me while you're away.
example.cn: 你外出期间给我写信。

example.en: He wrote me that he would be arriving Monday.
example.cn: 他给我写信说他将于星期一到达。

example.en: They wrote thanking us for the present.
example.cn: 他们写信来感谢我们赠送的礼物。

example.en: In his latest book he writes that the theory has since been disproved.
example.cn: 他在最近的一部书里写道，那个理论后来已被证明不能成立。

example.en: Ancient historians wrote of a lost continent beneath the ocean.
example.cn: 古代史学家写过有关一个沉没海底的大陆的事迹。

example.en: ‘Of all my books,’ wrote Dickens, ‘I like this the best.’
example.cn: 狄更斯写道：“在我所有的书中，我最喜欢这本。”

example.en: to write out a cheque
example.cn: 开一张支票

example.en: I'll write you a receipt.
example.cn: 我来给你开一张收据。

example.en: An error was reported when he tried to write data to the file for the first time.
example.cn: 当他第一次尝试把数据写入文档时，报告说有错。

example.en: This pen won't write.
example.cn: 这支钢笔不好使。

explain: v. - 编写；写信；写作；书写
网络 - 写字板；写入；写文件
